artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape with three figures in LRQ; pair of cranes--one perched in tall tree at center foreground, the other flying in LLQ; mountain in ULQ; accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Taura at Kinegawa in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
